description: This file defines the HealthService class which provides functionality to check the health status of a backend server by sending an HTTP GET request to the root endpoint. It uses environment variables for configuration and handles JSON decoding and error cases.

classes.name: HealthService
classes.description: A service class responsible for performing health checks on the backend server.

methods.name: checkHealth
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request to the backend's root URL to verify server health. Returns a message string indicating health status or throws an exception on failure.
